name: Vortex (itch) (Rakanishu)
description:
This map is available for Serious Sam: The Second Encounter and Serious Sam Classics: Revolution. It is also officially implemented in Serious Tournament Mod (STM) as a SkullHold map.

Author: Rakanishu 
Creation date:  February 2018
Latest Version: 23 May 2021 (Version 2)
Gamemodes (Rev & STM): DM, TDM, CTF, CZ, SH

Changelog

Version 2
* Changed position and color in level list.
* High Quality Thumbnail

Features:

This level is a deathmatch level playable between 2 and 4players for the following gamemodes:

  • Deathmatch (TSE, Rev, STM)
  • Team Deathmatch (Rev)
  • Capture The Flag (Rev)
  • Control Zone (Rev)
  • SkullHold (STM)
Serious Tournament Mod Availability

Serious Tournament Mod is a mod for Serious Sam Classic: The Second Encounter developed by Troy and Zeo. It has a lots of features as long as it's a mod in which you can play with bots in DM, TDM, CTF, etc... and even Survival. So this level Lumis is available in this mod in CTF and Domination gamemodes, you can get the mod here

Credits

Big thanks to the author of CastleOfDoom for Flare model, his Skybox. and the "Portal Brush" that I copied from his world. Huge thanks to Zeo for including my level in Serious Tournament Mod.
